mapper.sql: a.contract_type AS "contractType", a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.reference_id AS "referenceId", a.file_name AS "fileName", a.keywords AS "keywords", a.idnum AS "idNum", a.imgtext AS "imgText", a.companytype AS "companyType", a.sealtype AS "sealType", a.status AS "status", a.sealinfo AS "sealInfo", a.pdf_path AS "pdfPath", a.sealed_pdf_path AS "sealedPdfPath", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.sealed_count AS "sealedCount"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_contract_seal( contract_type, id, user_id, reference_id, file_name, keywords, idnum, imgtext, companytype, sealtype, status, sealinfo, pdf_path, sealed_pdf_path, create_time, update_time, sealed_count ) VALUES ( #{contractType}, #{id}, #{userId}, #{referenceId}, #{fileName}, #{keywords}, #{idNum}, #{imgText}, #{companyType}, #{sealType}, #{status}, #{sealInfo}, #{pdfPath}, #{sealedPdfPath}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{sealedCount} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_contract_seal SET contract_type = #{contractType}, user_id = #{userId}, reference_id = #{referenceId}, file_name = #{fileName}, keywords = #{keywords}, idnum = #{idNum}, imgtext = #{imgText}, companytype = #{companyType}, sealtype = #{sealType}, status = #{status}, sealinfo = #{sealInfo}, pdf_path = #{pdfPath}, sealed_pdf_path = #{sealedPdfPath}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, sealed_count = #{sealedCount} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT tsc.id, tsc.contract_id AS contractSeal, tb.borrowAliasNo AS borrowAliasNo, tb.borrowAlias AS borrowAlias, tb.loanNumber AS loanNumber, tu.userType AS userType, tu.userName AS userName, '---' AS cuserName, tb.BORROWAMOUNT AS investAmount, tb.ANUALRATE AS ANUALRATE, tb.DEADLINE AS DEADLINE, tb.full_borrow_date AS interestAccrualDate, tsc.contract_type AS contractType
FROM t_contract_seal tsc INNER JOIN t_borrow tb ON tb.borrow_id = tsc.reference_id INNER JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = tb.userid
1=1
AND contract_type = #{contractType}
AND contract_type in('PX_JKXY','XYZXXY')
AND tb.full_borrow_date BETWEEN #{beginCreateTime} AND #{endCreateTime}
AND tu.userName like '%${borrowName}%'
AND tb.borrowAliasNo like '%${borrowAliasNo}%'
AND tb.borrowAlias like '%${borrowAlias}%'
AND 1=2
AND tsc.contract_id = #{contractSeal}
and tsc.status='3' and tsc.contract_type in('PX_JKXY','XYZXXY')
UNION ALL SELECT tsc.id, tsc.contract_id AS contractSeal, tb.borrowAliasNo AS borrowAliasNo, tb.borrowAlias AS borrowAlias, tb.loanNumber AS loanNumber, tu.userType AS userType, tu.userName AS userName, '---' AS cuserName, tb.BORROWAMOUNT AS investAmount, tb.ANUALRATE AS ANUALRATE, tb.DEADLINE AS DEADLINE, tb.full_borrow_date AS interestAccrualDate, tsc.contract_type AS contractType
FROM t_contract_seal tsc INNER JOIN t_borrow tb ON tb.loanNumber = tsc.reference_id INNER JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = tb.userid
1=1
AND contract_type = #{contractType}
AND contract_type in('HKTXH')
AND tb.full_borrow_date BETWEEN #{beginCreateTime} AND #{endCreateTime}
AND tu.userName like '%${borrowName}%'
AND tb.borrowAliasNo like '%${borrowAliasNo}%'
AND tb.borrowAlias like '%${borrowAlias}%'
AND 1=2
AND tsc.contract_id = #{contractSeal}
and tsc.status='3' and tsc.contract_type in('HKTXH')
UNION ALL SELECT tsc.id, tsc.contract_id AS contractSeal, tb.borrowAliasNo AS borrowAliasNo, tb.borrowAlias AS borrowAlias, tb.loanNumber AS loanNumber, tu.userType AS userType, '---' AS userName, tu.userName AS cuserName, ti.investAmount AS investAmount, tb.ANUALRATE AS ANUALRATE, tb.DEADLINE AS DEADLINE, tb.full_borrow_date AS interestAccrualDate, tsc.contract_type AS contractType
FROM t_contract_seal tsc INNER JOIN t_invest ti ON tsc.reference_id = ti.id INNER JOIN t_borrow tb ON tb.borrow_id = ti.borrowId INNER JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = ti.investor
1=1
AND contract_type = #{contractType}
AND contract_type in('PX_CJZXXY')
AND tb.full_borrow_date BETWEEN #{beginCreateTime} AND #{endCreateTime}
AND 1=2
AND tb.borrowAliasNo like '%${borrowAliasNo}%'
AND tb.borrowAlias like '%${borrowAlias}%'
AND tu.userName like '%${investName}%'
AND tsc.contract_id = #{contractSeal}
and tsc.status='3' and tsc.contract_type in('PX_CJZXXY')
UNION ALL SELECT tsc.id, tsc.contract_id AS contractSeal, '---' AS borrowAliasNo, '---' AS borrowAlias, '---' AS loanNumber, tu.userType AS userType, tu.userName AS userName, tu.userName AS cuserName, '---' AS investAmount, '---' AS ANUALRATE, '---' AS DEADLINE, tsc.update_time AS interestAccrualDate, tsc.contract_type AS contractType
FROM t_contract_seal tsc INNER JOIN t_user tu ON tsc.reference_id = tu.id
1=1
AND contract_type = #{contractType}
AND contract_type in('PTZCXY')
AND tsc.update_time BETWEEN #{beginCreateTime} AND #{endCreateTime}
AND tu.userName like '%${borrowName}%' and userType='2'
AND 1=2
AND 1=2
AND tu.userName like '%${investName}%' and userType='1'
AND tsc.contract_id = #{contractSeal}
and tsc.status='3' and tsc.contract_type in('PTZCXY')
ORDER BY interestAccrualDate desc,contractSeal,contractType

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_invest v1 WHERE v1.borrowId=#{borrowId} AND v1.flag="1")*2+2 = (SELECT COUNT(*) AS c3 FROM t_contract_seal s1 WHERE s1.reference_id IN(SELECT v2.id FROM t_invest v2 WHERE v2.borrowId=#{borrowId} AND v2.flag="1") AND s1.STATUS="3") +(SELECT COUNT(*) AS c4 FROM t_contract_seal s2 WHERE s2.reference_id=#{borrowId} AND s2.STATUS="3") AS result
mapper.update: UPDATE t_borrow b SET b.BORROWSTATUS='11' WHERE b.BORROW_ID=#{borrowId}
UPDATE t_borrow_billplan tb SET tb.repay_time=SYSDATE() WHERE tb.apply_id = ( SELECT b.loanNumber FROM t_borrow b WHERE b.BORROW_ID=#{borrowId})
mapper.select: SELECT id,investAmount FROM t_invest WHERE flag='1' AND borrowId=#{borrowId}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_borrow b SET b.BORROWSTATUS='9' WHERE b.BORROW_ID=#{borrowId}
UPDATE t_borrow b SET b.make_loan='0' WHERE b.BORROW_ID=#{borrowId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_contract_seal SET reference_id=#{0}, contract_type=#{1}, STATUS="1"
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM `t_contract_seal` WHERE reference_id=#{0} and contract_type=#{1}
